Base class for classes used to reconstruct/interpolate left and right state for a riemann solver. More...

Detailed Description

template<class Tx, class Tad>
class Reconstruction< Tx, Tad >

Base class for classes used to reconstruct/interpolate left and right state for a riemann solver.

Definition at line 9 of file reconstruction.h.

Member Function Documentation

template<class Tx , class Tad >
void Reconstruction< Tx, Tad >::evaluate_chi ( const Array2D< const Tad > &  q,
Array2D< Tad > &  ql,
Array2D< Tad > &  qr 
)
virtual

Reconstruct left and right state for all the chi direction faces.

Parameters
[in]qcell centered variable, includes ghost points. size: (nic + nhalo) x (njc + nhalo)
[out]qlreconstructed left state. size: ni x njc
[out]qrreconstructed right state. size: ni x njc

Reimplemented in ReconstructionSecondOrder< Tx, Tad >, and ReconstructionFirstOrder< Tx, Tad >.
